questionTitle: When my uncle <u><font color='red'>was</font></u> <u><font color='red'>in</font></u> London, he <u><font color='red'>has stayed</font></u> in this hotel for <u><font color='red'>about</font></u> two weeks.
The <u><font color='red'>old</font></u> man <u><font color='red'>is reading</font></u> a newspaper <u><font color='red'>over there</font></u> is Jim's <u><font color='red'>father</font></u>.
I think she would <u><font color='red'>succeed</font></u> <u><font color='red'>if</font></u> <u><font color='red'>she</font></u> had tried <u><font color='red'>harder</font></u>.
My parents wish they <u><font color='red'>have</font></u> <u><font color='red'>enough</font></u> money <u><font color='red'>to</font></u> <u><font color='red'>buy</font></u> that building.

My brother <u><font color='red'>doesn't</font></u> care how much <u><font color='red'>does the car cost</font></u> <u><font color='red'>because</font></u> he <u><font color='red'>is going to buy</font></u> it anyway.
Some people were waiting calmly; ............... were shouting and screaming wildly.
Daisy's father, .............. words you can rely on, is always willing to help you.
A soldier has to learn to carry .................. orders as soon as they are given.
You should ask for your doctor's advice before ................... a new sport.
He ..................... very quickly from his illness.
As she ...................., the doctor said she had to stay out of crowds.
I am not sure, but ................... I know he has decided to accept the new job in London.
No one wants to eat at that restaurant ................. the food is very awful.
"When did you come home?" "I ............... here since last Sunday."
Tom could not go to sleep last night because of .................
After the water workers went on strike, there was a ............. of water.
Mary is very good at literature. She wants to take the ............... exams next year.
As far as I'm ................., it's quite all right for you to leave tomorrow.
This kind of plant only grows in ..................
No child ................ the age of sixteen will be admitted to this meeting.
Unless I approve of any .................. you make, you must not make any.
Mrs Young was ................... in a car accident.
If he ................ that you had difficulty, he would have given you his help.
Shall we wait for a table at this restaurant or go .................... else?
